attributes.additional_details:
Epsom (Surrey) has a significant population of London commuters who want Epsom to be included in London zone 6. This so that Oyster fares can be applied to their journeys.

There are many who get inconvenienced by travelling to Ewell, instead of their nearest railway station- which is Epsom.

Although Southern trains have introduced a smart card it does not fulfil the need of commuters for end to end, economical city travel.

Governments and businesses are for the people they serve. And this is a very valid demand of residents of this area which should not be neglected.

The issue has been dragging on for too long- which should not be the case.

Please include Epsom into Zone 6. Advise citizens of a time bound plan.
